com.eteks.sweethome3d.j3d

Class Object3DBranch

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject
      • javax.media.j3d.Node
        • javax.media.j3d.Group
          • javax.media.j3d.BranchGroup
            • com.eteks.sweethome3d.j3d.Object3DBranch
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ground3D, HomePieceOfFurniture3D, Label3D, Room3D, Wall3D

    public abstract class Object3DBranch
extends javax.media.j3d.BranchGroup
    Root of a branch that matches a home object.

      Returns the list of polygons points matching the given area with detailed information in areaPoints and areaHoles.

      Returns shared texture attributes matching transformation applied to the given texture and scaled if required.
      abstract void update()
      Updates this branch from the home object.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public abstract void update()
        Updates this branch from the home object.

      • getHomeTextureClone

        protected javax.media.j3d.Texture getHomeTextureClone(javax.media.j3d.Texture texture,
                                                      Home home)
        Returns a cloned instance of texture shared per home or the texture itself if home is null. As sharing textures across universes might cause some problems, it's safer to handle a copy of textures for a given home.

      • getShape

        protected Shape getShape(float[][] points)
        Returns the shape matching the coordinates in points array.

        protected javax.media.j3d.Material getMaterial(Integer diffuseColor,

                                                                 boolean scaled)
        Returns shared texture attributes matching transformation applied to the given texture and scaled if required.
